setting.title: Yankee Stadium
setting.p: Thinking there's a bomb, Koriand'r and Raven go to a baseball game to find it and stop it; however, it's a ploy by the villian to kill them. He first tries to shoot Raven from a distance, but she senses it first and dodges it. Raven finds the location, third base, and Koriand'r rushes the bomb into space for the impending explosion. She throws it a bit too late and goes into shock due to the explosion. Raven, as an empath, can help her by taking her pain.

setting.title: Space
setting.p: An unknown person is watching Raven and Koriand'r from a satellite in space.

setting.title: Buzzard's Bay, Massachusetts
setting.p: Marcy, a friend of Victor's before he became Cyborg, is running for her life. She wants out of the Church of Brother Blood but is killed by Mother Mayhem.

setting.title: Manhattan
setting.p: Cyborg feels guilty for being the reason she was kidnapped. He's afraid of getting close to people because he believes that all he can do is put people in danger. Marcy calls him before her death asking for help. Cyborg goes to see what happened but is too late to prevent her death.

setting.title: Somewhere in Massachusetts
setting.p: Sister Kayrn is being punished for withholding the information about Marcy and Victor being childhood friends and vouching for Marcy.

setting.title: Titans' Tower
setting.p: Victor requests the Titans' help on tracking down Brother Blood. After he hangs up, they talk among themselves about their worry for Victor.

setting.title: Manhattan
setting.p: Victor calls Robin and asks him to track down Brother Blood.

setting.title: The South Shore of Queens, New York
setting.p: This is the funeral for Marcy. Donald Reynolds, her father, catches a glimpse of Victor and blames him for his daughter's death. The Titans come to provide comfort to Victor. Her parents know the location of Brother Blood's Retreat.

setting.title: Brother Blood's Retreat
setting.p: Posing as normal teenagers, they go to the location that the Reynolds provided, the Church of Brother Blood.

setting.title: Below the Giant Cathedral
setting.p: From the new recruits, they sense an anomaly. Mother Mayhem reports to Brother Blood; tey were expecting this.

setting.title: The Church of Brother Blood
setting.p: The Titans change and then are taken to a ceremony. Brother Blood calls out sinners and asks for them to repent. He kills Wendy Fletcher for confessing she doesn't believe in him anymore. Feeling her pain, Raven reacts and Brother Blood orders his believers to attack, their cover offically blown. They start to fight back with Kid Flash heading for Blood. He doesn't get far as he gets electrocuted. He reveals that he has followers in all parts of the world and places of power(government, universities,etc.). He shots Robin, causing him to collapse. Wonder Girl attacks next. She doesn't fend off well and ends up in the same state as Robin and Kid Flash. Raven, sensing she will lose, tries to retrieve the other Titans and escape; however, Blood stops her. Now all Titans are been defeated.
